data.text:
Publish date: 2024-04-25

Roshon Fegan Quick InfoHeight5 ft 8 inWeight73 kgDate of BirthOctober 6, 1991Zodiac SignLibraEye Color

Dark Brown

Roshon Fegan is an American actor, rapper, singer, songwriter, musician, voice actor, and dancer. He is known for playing Ty Blue in the Disney Channel sitcom Shake It Up, Bobby DeBarge in the biographical musical drama film The Bobby DeBarge Story, Elbone (voice) in the animated series DreamWorks Dragons: Rescue Riders, Isaiah Hambrick in the mystery drama television series Greenleaf, and Sander Loyer in the Disney Channel original movie Camp Rock as well as its sequel Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam. In addition to that, Roshon Fegan has also been cast in other shows and movies such as What Still Remains, Spider-Man 2, Drillbit Taylor, Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend?, A.N.T. Farm, Dancing with the Stars, Insecure, Crazy Ex-Girlfriend, Kickinâ It, Motorcity, Monk, and Baby.

Born Name

Roshon Bernard Fegan

Nick Name

Ro, 3inaRo, Young Ro, Ya Boy Ro, RO.SHON, Ro Shon

Sun Sign

Libra

Born Place

Los Angeles, California, United States

Residence

California, United States

Nationality

Education

Roshon initially attended BK Acting Studio, USC 32nd Street Performing Arts School, and Hollywood High School. After this, he switched to homeschooling to better focus on his acting career.

Occupation

Actor, singer, songwriter, dancer, rapper, musician, voice actor

Family

Father â Roy Fegan (Actor, Producer, Director, President of 3inaRo Entertainment)

Mother â Cion Fegan

Manager

Roshon Fegan has been signed with â

Untitled Entertainment, Talent Management Company, Beverly Hills, California, United States

3inaRo Entertainment

Genre

Hip hop, dance, pop, R&B

Instruments

Vocals

Net Worth

His net worth had been $4 Million according to CelebrityNetWorth.com.

Build

Average

Height

5 ft 8 in or 173 cm

Weight

73 kg or 161 lbs

Girlfriend / Spouse

Roshon Fegan has dated â

Anna Maria Perez de Tagle (2008) â Roshon dated a Filipina actress Anna Maria Perez de Tagle for a couple of months in 2008.

Chelsie Hightower (2012-2014) â Roshon started dating an American dancer Chelsie Hightower in March 2012, when they met on the set of Dancing with the Stars. He finished 6th in the show after staying for 8 weeks in the TV show. The duo separated in 2014.

Caroline Sunshine (2013) â Actress Caroline and Roshon got together in January 2013. They dated for 2 months before calling it quits on February 28, 2013.

Camia Marie (2014) â In 2014, Roshon was dating model Camia Marie.

Dytto (2017-Present) â In 2017, Roshon commenced dating dancer Dytto. They had their first public appearance during the Childhelp Hollywood Heroes event held in Beverly Hills in October 2017.

Race / Ethnicity

Mixed (Black and Hispanic)

Roshon is half African-American on his fatherâs side and half Filipino on his motherâs side.

Hair Color

Black

Eye Color

Dark Brown

Distinctive Features

Mixed ethnicity

Religion

Roman Catholicism

Best Known For

Roshon played the role of Ty Blue on the Disney Channel original series, Shake It Up from 2010 to 2013. He is also known for portraying Sander Loyer in Camp Rock with Demi Lovato and the Jonas Brothers.

First Single

In 2011, Roshon released singles such as âI AMâ, âLove Your Loveâ, âOh Oh Ohâ, âGet It Poppinâ. He self-produced and also wrote the songs himself.

First Film

Roshon had a minor role in the 2004 superhero film Spider-Man 2 as an amazed kid.

First TV Show

In 2006, he guest appeared in the American comedy-drama TV series, Monk for his role as âThird Boyâ in the episode titled âMr. Monk and the Astronautâ.

As a voice actor, he made his TV show debut by providing vocals to the character of Darr Gordy in an episode titled Reunion of the animated sci-fi action-adventure series Motorcity in December 2012.

Personal Trainer

He has a very thin body and so he must be working out (primarily cardio) to remain that thin.

Roshon Fegan Favorite Things

Producer â J.R. Rotem

Source â TheCelebrityCafe.com

Rosh0n Fegan Facts

He is the owner of Grand Vault Studios.

He opted for homeschooling when Roshon got the role of Sander Loya in Camp Rock.

In 2012, he finished 6th in the 14th season of Dancing with the Stars.

He likes to collect shoes, watches, and hats from various fashion stores.

Roshon really likes the brand Zara as their clothing fits him the best.

In 2014, he co-starred as Nicky Roland in the horror-comedy fantasy film Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend?.

He wants to collaborate to do a duet with Will.I.Am or Chris Brown.

He appeared as David in the 2018 post-apocalyptic thriller film What Still Remains.

He has created his own label â3inaRo Entertainmentâ (pronounced â Three in a Row).

He was cast in the recurring role of Isaiah Hambrick, Zoraâs ex-boyfriend who is a rising young Christian singing bad boy from Triumph that is abusive to Zora both verbally and physically, in the mystery drama television series Greenleaf from 2017 to 2018.

In 2019, he started voicing the character of Elbone in the computer-animated series Dragons: Rescue Riders.
